thread.title: Rigoletto for Nanoli Stud Pune Derby
thread.title_full: Rigoletto for Nanoli Stud Pune Derby - The Times of India

author: Shailendra Awasthi
title: Rigoletto for Nanoli Stud Pune Derby
text:
Ace trainer Pesi Shroff 's two contenders, Rigoletto and Continental look better among the 10 horses in the Nanoli Stud Pune Derby , feature of Sunday's Pune races. Rigoletto has won two of his three career starts and his previous win last month was very impressive. In the hands of in-form jockey Trevor Patel, he certainly appeals most and likely to start as favourite. Rigoletto's stablemate Continental has similar career record. Though he had lost in his last run narrowly last month, he looks capable of toppling Rigoletto.
Bullrun, Multiglory , Magnificence and Intelligence are the others who can add colour to the finish. First race starts at 12.30 pm.
SELECTIONS
1. Jimmy Umrigar Trophy-DivII:Sans Peur 1, Majestic 2. 2. Pune Police Commissioner's Trophy-Div-II: Maleficent 1, Ashrafie 2. 3. Sir Sultan Chinoy Trophy-Div-I: Cannonball Run 1 Peppercorn 2. 4. Vivanta by TajBlue Diamond Trophy: Kayla 1 Geronimo 2. 5. Animal Welfare Board of India Cup: Shivalik Princess 1, Polar Zone 2. 6. Jimmy Umrigar Trophy-Div-I: Silvano 1, Aurelio 2. 7. Noshir & Dolly Dhunjibhoy Sprint Million: Senorita Evita 1, Brynhill 2. 8. Nanoli Stud Pune Derby (2000m): Rigoletto 1, Continental 2. 9. Pune Police Commissioner's Trophy-Div-I: Sugar Bay 1, Lucky Pineapple 2. 10. Sir Sultan Chinoy Trophy-Div-II: Hirohama 1 Abigail 2. Day's best:Maleficent
